attributes.action: Stop giving tax payers money to immigrants and make Britain British again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop funding immigrants and deport all illegals immediately before Britain is completely over-run. Any non-britsh person found guilty of committing crime so also be repatriated to relieve pressure within the Prison Service. 
Ensure any person arriving in this country knows that Britain is British and that historically means Christian.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
